      brand: {link: "http://www.techtudo.com.br/"},

    glb.headerReady = true;
    glb.headerCdn = true;
    document.dispatchEvent(new CustomEvent('glb.headerDom.ready'));

class="container-fluid hero"><div class="row"><div class="headline col-xs-12 col-md-8 col-md-offset-2"><div class="hero-wrapper__subhead__container"><h3 class="hero-wrapper__subhead">Investor Relations</h3></div><h1 class="hero-wrapper__title">We're building a stronger, globally integrated company.</h1><h2 class="hero-wrapper__text">Pitney Bowes is transforming by expanding into         Phx.$('.accordion.row > div > h2.accordion__title').each(function (i, e) {
            if(i > 0) {
                $(e).css('visibility', 'hidden');
            }
        });
    });

Phx.$('section.container-fluid div.accordion ul.link-container__links li').each(function(){
  Phx.$(this).children('a').addClass('icn-btn');
  Phx.$(this).children('a').contents().wrap('<span class="text"/>');
  Phx.$(this).children('a').prepend('<span class="icn large icn-download link-container__icon"></span>');
});
Phx.$('section.container-fluid div.accordion ul.link-container__links li').each(function() {
  Phx.$(this).children('img').remove();
});
</script><style>
.link-container--full .link-container__links li {
    padding-left: 80px !important;
}

    padding-left: 0px !important;

}
